website_summaries.verdict: For protection while snorkeling and diving, this snorkel vest with adjustable buoyancy is not only comfortable but also includes a handy pocket to store needed items.
pros: Those new to snorkeling and diving find this vest gives them more confidence, especially while ocean swimming
Neoprene on back protects from the sun
Easy to inflate and deflate even while on the water, and air doesn’t leak out
Doesn’t add a lot of bulk
cons: Some consumers feel the sizing is a bit off and suggest ordering a size up
On the expensive side for casual users

customer_reviews.title: Better than the standard snorkeling vest if you add a crotch belt
customer_reviews.text: This is nice high quality unit. As several others have mentioned this vest does tend to ride up on your chest when using it, and could use a strap that goes from front to back under the crotch that can be used to prevent this. Based on these reviews when I got my vest I added such a strap myself. I had a left over web belt so I simply cut it to the correct size and used waterproof glue that works with fabric to attach the ends ends of the web belt to the vest. My fix worked great and with the belt in place this vest gets a five star rating. :)
customer_reviews.author: nobody

customer_reviews.title: But it is very annoying when snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: Without a belt connecting front and back this vest climbs up and stops only at my chin. It pushes against the whole face snorkeling mask, and, as a result, i couldn snorkel only holding the vest down all the time. For the price i expected safety n comfort. But it is very annoying when snorkeling! Money wasted since i avoided wearing it at any cost!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too short...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6' and 230. Not gross fat, but certainly not svelte and I have large athletic shoulders. I ordered an extra large. The vest was way too short. It fit around my chest ok, but should have been 3" or 4" longer. It also doesn't have any air chamber around the back of your head, so the total amount of air it held seemed less than most other vests, therefore it probably had less buoyancy than some of the others. I didn't even give it a trial run in water -- returned it same day.
customer_reviews.author: vdub

customer_reviews.title: great vest, perfect for intended use.
customer_reviews.text: Took this for snorkeling in the Galapagos. Worked well to provide extra buoyancy without needing a wetsuit, giving a bit of extra confidence. The highly certified diving guide liked it so much that he took it in lieu of tips. He wanted it for his wife to use when she went in without him. Runs a bit smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: DiverseInterests

customer_reviews.title: Nice vest. Be careful to order for a tight fit
customer_reviews.text: These work as described and are comfortable. Easy to inflate/deflate and provide plenty of buoyancy when fully inflated. Be sure to order a size that will fit tightly. I'm returning my husband's because it was too loose and would have required modification with a crotch strap - not the most comfortable arrangement - in order to keep it from riding up. He's 6' and 205lbs. We ordered an XL but a Large would have been better. There's not a lot of adjustment ability to tighten them. We could tell it wouldn't work for him in water.
customer_reviews.author: Lorieslick

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous, used it to snorkel in Florida and worked great. Comfortable and sturdy, easy to inflate and deflate. Stretches, which improves mobility. The only reason why I did not give 5 stars is because the back is black, it should be a bright color to improve visability when you are snorkeling so you can be seen from above when head down.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkibeach

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I ordered XL for me but I can't zip it up with a 36" waistline. I ordered an XS for my Filipina girlfriend and it is too small for her. The children used them in the wave pool and really enjoyed them.
customer_reviews.author: Perry A

customer_reviews.title: that would be better. I have tried it out in a non-emergency ...
customer_reviews.text: It has manual inflation only, which I have not had to use in an emergency situation. It fits according to my clothing size. It is tight fitting, which it needs to be. It has a side zipper, which requires some degree of exertion and stretching to zip once you have put the vest on. If you can manage to put it on with the zipper closed, that would be better. I have tried it out in a non-emergency situation and it does give adequate flotation with just a few breaths. It protects most of the back from sunburn.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept but does not work well.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well however it rides up when inflated. Sholud have a belt or strap to keep it from riding up. I would return it but I already tested it in the ocean. Nice concept but does not work well in practice
customer_reviews.author: FLLRA

customer_reviews.title: I think I would have liked it - if it fit me.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 52" chest and I managed to SQUEEZE into this vest but no way would I be comfortable in it for any length of time. My guess is that anyone with a chest larger than 46 will end up returning it. Shame that XL is the largest size.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Vigants

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small.
customer_reviews.text: Great vest but way way undersized, had to send it back which was well handled. I’m an extra large or generous large so I ordered the largest size available and still too small. Frankly I’m disappointed as it was exactly what I was looking for. JG
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vest
customer_reviews.text: Great vest for snorkling. I'm not a condifent swimmer. I had it on, but never felt the need to inflate it. Definitely looks better than the resort issue snorkle vest. Also provides a little warmth in cooler waters. I'm a 5'11" 230lb. Ordered the XL. It fit fine,but I did notice it riding up a little bit on occasion in the water like some others have mentioned. Nothing too distracting.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife on our most recent snorkeling trip. The ability to inflate / deflate on demand was really helpful adjusting the perfect buoyancy while snorkeling. Also it fits tight on the body preventing the vest from rising up when you enter the water. This is keeper. I would definitely recommend for those who loves to snorkel, but still a weak swimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Chang

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: It works very well as intended. Fast service by ScubaPro.
customer_reviews.author: mk1973

customer_reviews.title: We irked great. Much more comfortable than the inflatable life jackets ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to Hawaii. We irked great. Much more comfortable than the inflatable life jackets supplied by the one tour operaterm offered on catamaran snorkel trip. Theis didn't have any neoprene. The bit of warmth this added was perfect. Would like to add a between legs strap to prevent ride up and/or side adjustment tabs to customize fit.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit!
customer_reviews.text: Used this vest to snorkel in the Bahamas. It is extremely comfortable. The fit keeps it from riding up under your chin. Works so much better than the vests that are provided on the excursions.
customer_reviews.author: susan.l.ledford

customer_reviews.title: Best snorkeling vest!
customer_reviews.text: Best snorkeling vest! Neoprene helps it fit snug, so it doesn’t shift up. Also provides some warmth. Be sure to shut valve when not inflating/deflating or you will get water in it.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Much better than rentals!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit! JUST what we needed to finish out our own set of snorkeling gear. We are now able to go snorkeling where we want, without having to make sure there is a local dive shop from which to rent vests.
customer_reviews.author: CatCreekJim

customer_reviews.title: Literally a Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, comfortable, made out of wet suit material, easy to put on and take off, easy to inflate. Just made it possible to snorkel a couple of hours, twice a day for seven days in a row. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Luis F. Celorio

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loved to see this on me
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loved to see this on me, considering the entire boat had bulky get in the way vest's. ! am 5'10" and weigh 160lbs and the medium fit perfect! Not cheap, but worth it :-}
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne A.

customer_reviews.title: Order it a little smaller than  normal
customer_reviews.text: Order it a little smaller than you normally would so when you swim around it does not ride up on your neck and face. Good product
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: The best best for snorkeling!
customer_reviews.text: The best vest for snorkeling!!! Light and durable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Well made.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous item, it works as described and fits a little big, so keep that in mind when ordering, I'm a 6'1" 240lb and the XL was a little more loose than I thought it would be. Other than that, its great. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Great vest
customer_reviews.text: Wore this snorkeling in the Bahamas just before Thanksgiving. Fits great. Looks great. I didn't really have any problems with it riding up and it was easy to inflate to just the right buoyancy for me. Much better than the strap on bladder type of vest.
customer_reviews.author: JimW

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this vest. It sits close to the chest with a very streamlined fit. Much preferred to the less-expensive and bulky vests if you snorkel often.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Snorkel Vest
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to wear while snorkeling. It was true to size and fit perfectly. Was delivered promptly.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rial

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit, good quality, would be 5 star, with crotch strap. I know straps are uncomfortable, but would stop vest from riding up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The zipper is a little too flimsy. I will write more when I use it March 12-18.
customer_reviews.author: Suz Z Que

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, it is definitely sized for women
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, it is definitely sized for women. I wear a small and Ian 5'4 and 130 lbs and the small fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: lisa hirt

customer_reviews.title: Great product, not bulky for luggage, does ride up but you can fix that.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, easy to carry on cruise ships, not heavy or bulky worked great. Does ride up so I will attach a strap before the next boating outing.
customer_reviews.author: Truth and nothing but ...

customer_reviews.title: Don't go into the water without one!
customer_reviews.text: I'll never snorkel without my ScubaPro again. Awesome accessory. You can adjust the level of inflation to suit your needs and it gives you that added confidence in deep water. I'm 5'2" and wear a women's size 8. The medium fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie from Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Fit is great, it's comfortable (snug enough without being constricting) and ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit is great, it's comfortable (snug enough without being constricting) and is easy to put on and swim with. I'm excited to use this on my upcoming honeymoon to the Virgin Islands.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie

customer_reviews.title: looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, fits my 6'-2" / 225# body well, looks good.
customer_reviews.author: RdgRam

customer_reviews.title: scubagro cruiser snorkeling snorker vest
customer_reviews.text: nice and easy to use. light weight and safe good color and can be seen at a glance
customer_reviews.author: fred michael

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Much more comfortable than the Mae West type snorkel vests.
customer_reviews.author: E. Su

customer_reviews.title: Beats wearing those old vests for tourist.
customer_reviews.text: It performed as advertised. I'm a 33 waist so bought the medium size and fit very snug once zipped. Only issue is to make pocket a little bigger to maybe old a small camera.
customer_reviews.author: Pete G

customer_reviews.title: Great looking vest
customer_reviews.text: fits a bit snug but that's the way it should fit. Good materials, this might just do the trick
customer_reviews.author: Nene

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Have not used yet, heading to Australia in November, will post another review then. Purchased smaller size than normal for me due to recommendations of prior posts. To fit "snug". Definitely snug, will see if I made the right decision or not in November.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Lillard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this snorkel vest. It's comfortable and streamlined.
customer_reviews.author: rjw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just got it - it fits well. Won't be using it for another month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Sedona Joel

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS VEST!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! I am new to snorkeling and not a strong swimmer. Best purchase I made before my trip to the Keys. I felt secure and able to enjoy the experience. The fit was perfect, and I had no issues with it riding up on me. Stylish and functional. 👍😎
customer_reviews.author: Angie Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Works great! You can adjust adjust the degree of floatation
customer_reviews.text: Works great! You can adjust adjust the degree of floatation.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have when you go snorkeling. I had a great with it. very comfortable when wearing it, you don't feel like you are wearing a vest.
customer_reviews.author: Jcwchen

customer_reviews.title: Snorkel Vest
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vest for a recent trip to the islands. We planned to snorkel daily in-shore and I am a strong swimmer, but wanted to be safe in case of currents. I used this vest for six days and it worked well for me. It fit well and was comfortable for up to several hours at a time. It folds and fitted easily into a small mesh gear bag along with my wife's vest. I would highly recommend this product for snorkeling trips.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Corneal

customer_reviews.title: Well  done
customer_reviews.text: Like other scubapro proctuds is really nice the design is impressive and fit pretty well with the neoprene base esay to use
customer_reviews.author: Claudio C. Mauro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Felt secure with this vest in the water. Wore it over a shortie wet suit.
customer_reviews.author: GWS1951

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this vest
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this vest. Worked well. Only downside is the largest it comes in is XL. A XXL would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Maruszak

customer_reviews.title: Product did not fit. Seller would not accept return ...
customer_reviews.text: Product did not fit. Seller would not accept return because i was 1 day late.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... swim very well and this had helped me a great deal with floating in the water
customer_reviews.text: I can't swim very well and this had helped me a great deal with floating in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Peter

customer_reviews.title: Fine vest
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and comfortable. Easily inflated and deflated. Neoprene back protects from sun and provides comfort. Must remember to apply sunscreen to posterior shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: wloiii

customer_reviews.title: The vest worked very well but should have straps attached ...
customer_reviews.text: The vest worked very well but should have straps attached to the bottom to go between your legs to keep from riding up.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn H.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: VERY comfortable, not bulky, easy to inflate, deflate and regulate the air volume for buoyancy... and the full back even prevents sunburn !
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly, so glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'11" 195lbs with a bit of a beer gut. The large seemed snug but actually once it got wet it fit fine. Made snorkeling so much easier due to the fact you can control the buoyancy. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Johnson

customer_reviews.title: ) He also liked the functionally
customer_reviews.text: My husbban used it in Tahiti, hid his beer belly (LOVED IT!) He also liked the functionally. Great
customer_reviews.author: Anita Zarate

customer_reviews.title: I AM SCUBA DIVER I WILL LIKE TO USE EXTRA PROTECTION JUST IN CASE MY BCD HAVE ANY DAMAGE.
customer_reviews.text: I AM SCUBA DIVER I WILL LIKE TO USE EXTRA PROTECTION JUST IN CASE MY BCD HAVE ANY DAMAGE. WITH THIS VEST YOU WILL HAVE LIFESAVER VEST AND A WETSUIT FOR SCUBA DIVE. YOU WILL HAVE TWO ITEM IN ONE ITEM. SINCERELY: BRUNO
customer_reviews.author: BRUNO

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product - easy to inflate and deflate - fits snug against the body - gave me the comfort in the water to go snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: devTastic LLC

customer_reviews.title: If you snorkel, buy this!
customer_reviews.text: We just recently came back from a trip were we did quite a bit of snorkeling. The vest was awesome. When the conditions were a little rougher, I was able to inflate the vest to the desired level while in the water. I would highly recommend this product, especially for those of us who are less buoyant.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey gawlowski

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Great for snorkeling; works well, highly visible, and adds some protection and warmth. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sea View

customer_reviews.title: it's scuba pro how far wrong could I go?
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5-10 210 lbs and the X-Large was the perfect size for me. Does not ride up like my old floatie vest.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Warner

customer_reviews.title: We chose the best vest!
customer_reviews.text: We went online to find a good snorkeling vest. This one is higher than the rest but it's also the best. We are thrilled and enjoyed having our backs covered with no sunburn on our latest cruise.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Snorkeler!

customer_reviews.title: Performed beautifully and as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Performed beautifully and as advertised. One important improvement would be to add straps at the waist that can cinch tighter to prevent the vest riding up. Otherwise, excellent tool.
customer_reviews.author: michelan sisti

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in all aspects & highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: A+++++, Will buy again! Excellent in all aspects & highly recommend!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: cyndie simon

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: The vest worked great! used it everyday in DR last week. Much better than i anticipated. AND as an added benefit, the vest helped cover my slight beer belly :) I was pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great Vest
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. I like the visible color. I'm a big guy and it works as promised. The only thing I can add it would be perfect if there was a groin strap to keep the vest from rising up. Otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Walter A. Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband and he loved it
customer_reviews.author: micki madison

customer_reviews.title: I really like it!
customer_reviews.text: The fit is snug but doesn't ride up at all! I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Karla Rogers

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Item ran very small and it took forever to get my money back
customer_reviews.author: Hope394

product_meta.title: Scubapro Cruiser Snorkel Vest Adult for Men Women Inflatable Snorkeling Jacket for Snorkeling Diving Swimming
product_meta.description: Scubapro Cruiser Adult Snorkeling Vest provides lots of surface comfort, here's how to enjoy safe and stress-free snorkeling. The CRUISER snorkeling vest is constructed of durable nylon and stretchable neoprene to provide maximum comfort and a snug fit. The inflatable front bladder provides extra buoyancy for comfort while snorkeling. It is offered in high-visibility yellow for surface safety and includes a security pocket for stowing accessories.
feature_bullets: Durable Nylon & Stretchable Neoprene Provide Maximum Comfort & Snug Fit
Inflatable Front Bladder Provides Extra Buoyancy easy to Inflate Oral Inflation Valve
1/8" Neoprene adds warmth while not compromising comfort in warm-water snorkeling protects snorkeler's back from excessive sun exposure
